## domGetSize() function

获取dom元素或window的大小

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function domGetSize(el: Element | Window): {
    width: number;
    height: number;
} | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | Element \| Window | DOM元素 |

**Returns:**

{ width: number; height: number; } \| undefined

包含width和height的对象
